name: multi-phase-sequential
description: Three phases executed sequentially, each passes CI - verifies phase advancement

parent_issue.title: Multi-phase feature implementation
parent_issue.body:
## Description

A complex feature broken into three phases.

## Requirements

Phase 1: Setup infrastructure
Phase 2: Implement core logic
Phase 3: Add polish and documentation

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All three phases complete
- [ ] Tests pass for each phase

sub_issues.title: Phase 1: Setup
sub_issues.body:
## Todos

- [ ] Create directory structure
- [ ] Add configuration files

## Testing

- [ ] Config validation passes

sub_issues.title: Phase 2: Core Implementation
sub_issues.body:
## Todos

- [ ] Implement core business logic
- [ ] Add unit tests

## Testing

- [ ] All unit tests pass

sub_issues.title: Phase 3: Polish
sub_issues.body:
## Todos

- [ ] Add documentation
- [ ] Code cleanup

## Testing

- [ ] Lint passes
